  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elevating the Everyday: Laurel True</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhöhen das tägliche: Lorbeer Zutreffend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élévation du journalier : Laurier Vrai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elevating o diário: Laurel Verdadeiro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elevamento del giornaliere: Alloro 
Allineare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανύψωση τον καθημερινού: Δάφνη αληθινή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elevación del diario: Laurel Verdad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK checks in on mosaic artist Laurel True's latest mural, which decorates a building across the street from her Oakland studio. This Educator Guide addresses the history and traditions of mosaic art and mosaic murals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN überprüft innen auf zutreffendes neuestes
Wandbild des Mosaikkünstler Lorbeers, das ein Gebäude über der 
Straße von ihrem Oakland Studio verziert. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung adressiert die Geschichte und die Traditionen der 
Mosaikkunst und der Mosaikwandbilder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE signe sur mural de laurier d'artiste 
de mosaïque le véritable dernier, qui décore un bâtiment à 
travers la rue de son studio d'Oakland. Ce guide d'éducateur 
adresse l'histoire et les traditions de l'art de mosaïque et des 
muraux de mosaïque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA verifica dentro no mural o mais atrasado
verdadeiro do laurel do artista do mosaic, que decora um edifício 
através da rua de seu estúdio de Oakland. Esta guia do 
educador dirige-se ao history e às tradições da arte do mosaic e 
dos murals do mosaic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA controlla dentro mural dell'alloro 
dell'artista del mosaico sul vero ultimo, che decori una costruzione 
attraverso la via dal suo studio de Oakland. Questa guida 
dell'educatore richiama la storia e le tradizioni dell'arte del 
mosaico e dei murals del mosaico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ ελέγχει μέσα στην αληθινή πιό πρόσφατη 
τοιχογραφία δαφνών καλλιτεχνών μωσαϊκών, η οποία διακοσμεί ένα
κτήριο πέρα από την οδό από το στούντιο του Όουκλάντ της. 
Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών εξετάζει την ιστορία και τις 
παραδόσεις τέχνης μωσαϊκών και τοιχογραφιών μωσαϊκών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA llega en el mural más último verdadero
del laurel del artista del mosaico, que adorna un edificio a través 
de la calle de su estudio de Oakland. Esta guía del educador 
trata la historia y las tradiciones del arte del mosaico y de los 
murals del mosaico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
